## ESPHome Workshop Guidelines

* [Vision and Goals](../PROJECT.md): Understand the high-level vision and objectives of the project.
* [System Architecture and Design Principles](../ARCHITECTURE.md): Overall system architecture, design patterns, and design principles that guide the development process.
* [Contributing Guidelines](../CONTRIBUTING.md): Overview of the project's contributing guidelines and collaboration practices.

Suggest to update these documents if you find any incomplete or conflicting information during your work. If unclear about request, pause and ask questions.

Use astro mcp for the latest documentation.
